about_the_game:
Embark on a quest to kill the Undying King of Annam, who managed to achieve immortality through sinister means. The King traps millions of souls under his rule, preventing them from death and reincarnation.

Angered by the King’s act, the Netherworld deities are summoning Revenants of forgotten past back to the mortal realm. Your quest: Kill the King who cheated death.

Parry-focused combat

Challenging combat that emphasizes going toe to toe against enemies with chainable parries, skillful dodges and Yin & Yang combo system. Each weapon has its own unique powerful Weapon Art that can turn the tide of battle.

Multiple playable classes

Revenants come from various backgrounds and origins, each with their own unique skills, weapons and combat styles. But beware, if they perish in the mortal realm, their soul is gone forever.

Explore the Old Capital

Explore the old capital of Annam with interconnected areas, hidden paths, unlockable shortcuts and deadly elite enemies. Throughout the journey, you will discover multiple weapons, ancient skill texts, rare materials and powerful talismans to help your Revenants grow ever more powerful.

Awakening

As agent of the Netherworld, you can enlist the help of other NPC Ghosts in the Netherworld, from a melancholy blacksmith to a conniving peddler. Upgrade weapons, train your combat instincts, level up stats, manage your Revenants' talents.

  • Challenging Sekiro-like combat with satisfying parries

  • Multiple playable classes, each with different weapons and combat styles

  • Explore the Grand Capital city of Annam, filled with mysteries and hidden paths

  • Discover the king's secret to his immortality, and decide the fate of the Old Kingdom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400、AMD Ryzen™ 5 3400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 4GB、Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-8700、AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 6GB、Radeon RX 5700XT 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48kHz WAVE file can be played

short_description: Blackblade Revenant is a Sekiro-like action RPG with parry-focused combat set during the fall of an ancient dynasty. Rise from the dead as Revenants and return to the mortal realm with one mission: Kill the King who cheated death.
